trans-unit.source: How to perform live encoding with on-premises encoders
trans-unit.target: How to perform live encoding with on-premises encoders

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to use .NET to perform live encoding with on-premises encoders.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to use .NET to perform live encoding with on-premises encoders.

trans-unit.source: The following are required to complete the tutorial:
trans-unit.target: The following are required to complete the tutorial:

trans-unit.source: An Azure account.
trans-unit.target: An Azure account.

trans-unit.source: A Media Services account.
trans-unit.target: A Media Services account.

trans-unit.source: To create a Media Services account, see <linkText>How to Create a Media Services Account</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To create a Media Services account, see <linkText>How to Create a Media Services Account</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Set up your dev environment.
trans-unit.target: Set up your dev environment.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>Set up your environment</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>Set up your environment</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: A webcam.
trans-unit.target: A webcam.

trans-unit.source: For example, <linkText>Telestream Wirecast encoder</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For example, <linkText>Telestream Wirecast encoder</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Recommended to review the following articles:
trans-unit.target: Recommended to review the following articles:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure Media Services RTMP Support and Live Encoders</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure Media Services RTMP Support and Live Encoders</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Working with Channels that Receive Multi-bitrate Live Stream from On-premises Encoders</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Working with Channels that Receive Multi-bitrate Live Stream from On-premises Encoders</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to achieve the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: The following code example demonstrates how to achieve the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: Connect to Media Services
trans-unit.target: Connect to Media Services

trans-unit.source: Create a channel
trans-unit.target: Create a channel

trans-unit.source: Update the channel
trans-unit.target: Update the channel

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the channel’s input endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Retrieve the channel’s input endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The input endpoint should be provided to the on-premises live encoder.
trans-unit.target: The input endpoint should be provided to the on-premises live encoder.

trans-unit.source: The live encoder converts signals from the camera to streams that are sent to the channel’s input (ingest) endpoint.
trans-unit.target: The live encoder converts signals from the camera to streams that are sent to the channel’s input (ingest) endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the channel’s preview endpoint
trans-unit.target: Retrieve the channel’s preview endpoint

trans-unit.source: Create and start a program
trans-unit.target: Create and start a program

trans-unit.source: Create a locator needed to access the program
trans-unit.target: Create a locator needed to access the program

trans-unit.source: Create and start a StreamingEndpoint
trans-unit.target: Create and start a StreamingEndpoint

trans-unit.source: Update the streaming endpoint
trans-unit.target: Update the streaming endpoint

trans-unit.source: Get locators for all your streaming endpoints
trans-unit.target: Get locators for all your streaming endpoints

trans-unit.source: Shut down resources
trans-unit.target: Shut down resources

trans-unit.source: For information on how to configure a live encoder, see <linkText>Azure Media Services RTMP Support and Live Encoders</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information on how to configure a live encoder, see <linkText>Azure Media Services RTMP Support and Live Encoders</linkText><title></title>.
